# Pull Request

## Description

<!-- Describe your changes in 1-2 sentences -->

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change fixing an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change adding functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature causing existing functionality to change)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Infrastructure/DevOps change
- [ ] Security fix

## Testing

- [ ] Tests pass locally (`make test`)
- [ ] Linters pass (`make lint`)
- [ ] Type checking passes (`make typecheck`)
- [ ] E2E tests pass (if applicable)
- [ ] Manually tested in development environment

## Database Changes

- [ ] No database changes
- [ ] Migration included (uses CONCURRENTLY for indexes)
- [ ] Migration tested on clean database
- [ ] Rollback procedure documented

## Security Considerations

- [ ] No security implications
- [ ] Security review requested
- [ ] Secrets/credentials properly handled
- [ ] Input validation added/verified
- [ ] XSS/injection risks considered

## Checklist

- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] No console.log or debug code
- [ ] Conventional commit message format
- [ ] Screenshots attached (for UI changes)

## Related Issues

Fixes #<!-- issue number -->
